          <title>
            <string language="en">Electronic control circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronisches Steuerstromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit de commande électronique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito de controle eletrônico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito di controllo elettronico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρονικό κύκλωμα ελέγχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito de control electrónico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The diagram illustrates an electronic control circuit that switches OFF an LED when light is detected by the photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic control circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LED</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light emitting diode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">off</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photoresistor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Diagramm veranschaulicht einen elektronisches 
diesen Steuerstromkreis Schalter WEG VON einer LED, wenn Licht durch 
das photoresistor entdeckt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le diagramme illustre un circuit de commande 
électronique ce des commutateurs OUTRE d'une DEL quand la lumière 
est détectée par le photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O diagrama ilustra um circuito de controle 
eletrônico esse interruptores FORA de um diodo emissor de luz quando 
a luz é detectada pelo photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo schema illustra un circuito di controllo 
elettronico quel interruttori FUORI di un LED quando la luce è 
rilevata dal photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί ένα ηλεκτρονικό κύκλωμα 
ελέγχου που σβήνει τις οδηγήσεις όταν ανιχνεύεται το φως από 
photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El diagrama ilustra un circuito de control 
electrónico ese los interruptores de un LED cuando la luz es 
detectada por el photoresistor.</string>
          </description>
